---

## Problem Statement
Describe the problem this feature would solve or the opportunity it enables.

## Proposed Solution
Outline the change you are proposing. Include API signatures, CLI flags, or data
model updates when applicable.

## Alternatives Considered
List any alternative solutions or workarounds you have evaluated.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, references, or screenshots that would help us understand
the request.
